name: Purging Finale
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, removing one of the following conditions on a creature within range affected by your bardic performance: cowering, dazzled, exhausted, paralyzed, shaken, or stunned.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 施放这个法术之前，你必须激活一种吟游表演。通过挥舞手臂进行谢幕，你会立即结束你的吟游表演，选择一名在你的吟游表演影响范围内的生物，移除下列效果之一：畏缩，目眩，力竭，麻痹，战栗或震慑。
